Yougou'''|ja=影向山|ja_rm=Yougou-zan}}|description=<p>The [[Grand Narukami Shrine]] sits at the top of the mountain along with the [[Sacred Sakura]].</p><p>Beside the mountain at the base is a large pool of [[Electro Water]] that drains HP. After completing [[Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual]], the pool becomes de-energized.</p><p>The [[Version 2.0]] livestream mentions that the mountain is related to the legend of [[tengu]].</p>}}
